item.title: Making a tele command
item.dc:creator: @Jeremy368 Jeremy368
item.description:
@Jeremy368 wrote:

To:teady160
WTF are you talking about…

To:Darkning
i suggest restricting the use of the command by player rights and the command you want is a very simple one to make

This is how i do it on my server:

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("godwars")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by Mod Jeremy } else { teleportToX = 2867; teleportToY = 3758; sendMessage("You teleport to God Wars."); }
you you i think you would just change “teleportToX” to “toX” and “toY” very simple

Read full topic

item.title: Making a tele command
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

i tryed making a command that will tele admins to the admin spot. When you do the command nothing happens.

if (command.startsWith("admin") && playerRights >= 2) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newPosX = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newPosY = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); toX = 2520; toY = 4645; } }

I am using deltascape based source.

Read full topic
